body_text: The add-on stores preference study values in preferences so they are available during early startup. QA has  reported that  these preferences stay past the end of the study. Once a study is over, the matching preferences in this subtree should be removed.
body_html: The add-on stores preference study values in preferences so they are available during early startup. QA has reported that these preferences stay past the end of the study. Once a study is over, the matching preferences in this subtree should be removed.
title: At the end of a study, remove "extensions.shield-recipe-client.startupExperimentPrefs." prefs
body: The add-on stores preference study values in preferences so they are available during early startup. QA has  reported that  these preferences stay past the end of the study. Once a study is over, the matching preferences in this subtree should be removed.
